about.name: Luke Dalton
about.blurb: I am a recent graduate that is eager to learn more in a real-world setting, and help build awesome websites.

work.title: Computer Technician I
work.description: I currently deploy, troubleshoot, and maintain PCs and servers (hardware & software), create user accounts, maintain intranet page, create file shares, program telephone and door systems, minor networking tasks, and anything else that comes to our small IT department.
work.cooperation: Worked with members of other departments to select, and implement a new time keeping system.  Helped coordinate tearing down, moving, and rebuilding several departments' workspace during a remodel.  Deployed and maintain virtual environment. Recipient of several thank you cards for exceptional attitude, and helpfulness.

work.title: Teacher's Assistant
work.description: Assisted students with learning, and troubleshooting the Java programming language, and computer programming basics.

work.title: Assistant Manager
work.description: At Super Pantry I reconciled paperwork, created work schedule, prepared bank deposit, and provided outstanding customer service to customers.
